module.exports = {

"use client";
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
;
//import { useSession } from "next-auth/react"; // what is this for?
const socket = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$socket$2e$io$2d$client$2f$build$2f$esm$2d$debug$2f$index$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__$3c$locals$3e$__["default"])("http://127.0.0.1:5000"); // ‚úÖ Connect to WebSocket server
function AllTasks() {
    const [selectedTask, setSelectedTask1] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(null); // ‚úÖ Tracks currently selected task
    const [tasks1, setTasks] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])([]);
    const [contributors, setContributors] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])([]);
    const [filteredTasks, setFilteredTasks] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])([]);
    const [taskStatus, setTaskStatus] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])({});
    const [expandedTasks, setExpandedTasks] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])({});
    const [darkMode, setDarkMode] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(true);
    const [projects, setProjects] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])([]);
    const [filters, setFilters] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])({
        project: "",
        taskType: "",
        status: ""
    });
    const [selectedProjectId, setSelectedProjectId] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(""); // ‚úÖ Track default project
    const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen1] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(false);
    const [isDeleteModalOpen, setIsDeleteModalOpen] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(false);
    const [taskToDelete, setTaskToDelete] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(null);
    const openDeleteModal = (taskId)=>{
        setTaskToDelete(taskId);
        setIsDeleteModalOpen(true);
    };
    // ‚úÖ Fetch Contributors based on whether a project is selected
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        if (!selectedProjectId) {
            console.log("üîÑ Fetching all contributors...");
            fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/contributors") // ‚úÖ Updated API now includes projects array
            .then((res)=>res.json()).then((data)=>{
                if (!Array.isArray(data)) {
                    console.error("‚ùå Contributors API response is not an array!", data);
                    return;
                }
                // üîπ Ensure `projects` is always an array
                const cleanedData = data.map((c)=>({
                        ...c,
                        projects: Array.isArray(c.projects) ? c.projects : []
                    }));
                console.log("‚úÖ Global Contributors loaded:", cleanedData);
                setContributors(cleanedData);
            }).catch((error)=>console.error("‚ùå Error fetching global contributors:", error));
        } else {
            console.log(`üîÑ Fetching contributors for project ID ${selectedProjectId}...`);
            fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${selectedProjectId}/contributors/manage`).then((res)=>res.json()).then((data)=>{
                if (!Array.isArray(data)) {
                    console.error("‚ùå Project Contributors API response is not an array!", data);
                    return;
                }
                console.log(`‚úÖ Contributors for project ${selectedProjectId} loaded:`, data);
                // ‚úÖ Ensure contributors have `is_in_project` properly flagged
                const updatedData = data.map((c)=>({
                        ...c,
                        is_in_project: c.is_in_project ?? true
                    }));
                setContributors(updatedData);
            }).catch((error)=>console.error(`‚ùå Error fetching contributors for project ${selectedProjectId}:`, error));
        }
    }, [
        selectedProjectId
    ]); // ‚úÖ Re-run when selectedProjectId changes
    // ‚úÖ WebSocket: Listen for contributor updates
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        socket.on("update_contributors", (updatedContributor)=>{
            console.log("üì° WebSocket Update: Contributor Changed!", updatedContributor);
            setContributors((prevContributors)=>{
                // Remove contributor if marked as removed
                if (updatedContributor.removed) {
                    return prevContributors.filter((c)=>c.id !== updatedContributor.id);
                }
                // Update existing contributor or add new one
                const existingIndex = prevContributors.findIndex((c)=>c.id === updatedContributor.id);
                if (existingIndex !== -1) {
                    prevContributors[existingIndex] = updatedContributor;
                    return [
                        ...prevContributors
                    ]; // Trigger state update
                }
                return [
                    ...prevContributors,
                    updatedContributor
                ];
            });
        });
        return ()=>{
            socket.off("update_contributors"); // ‚úÖ Cleanup listener
        };
    }, []);
    // ‚úÖ WebSocket: Listen for task updates (Contributors assigned to tasks)
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        socket.on("update_task", (updatedTask)=>{
            console.log("üì° WebSocket Update: Task Contributor Changed!", updatedTask);
            setTasks((prevTasks)=>prevTasks.map((task1)=>task1.id === updatedTask.taskId ? {
                        ...task1,
                        contributor_id: updatedTask.contributor_id,
                        contributor_name: updatedTask.contributor_name
                    } : task1));
        });
        return ()=>{
            socket.off("update_task"); // ‚úÖ Cleanup listener
        };
    }, []);
    // Automatically Refetch Contributors When Project Changes
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        console.log(`üì° Selected project changed to: ${selectedProjectId}, refetching contributors...`);
    }, [
        selectedProjectId
    ]);
    const handleContributorChange = async (taskId, newContributorId)=>{
        console.log(`üìå handleContributorChange called with Task ID: ${taskId}, Contributor ID: ${newContributorId}`);
        try {
            // Fetch the current contributors of the task's project
            const task1 = tasks1.find((t)=>t.id === taskId);
            if (!task1) {
                console.error(`‚ùå Error: taskId is undefined!`, {
                    taskId,
                    newContributorId
                });
                return;
            }
            const projectId = task1.project_id;
            // ‚úÖ Fetch the current contributors of the task's project
            const contributorsResponse = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}/contributors/manage`);
            let projectContributors = await contributorsResponse.json();
            // ‚úÖ Ensure projectContributors is an array
            if (!Array.isArray(projectContributors)) {
                console.error("‚ùå Error: API response for contributors is not an array!", projectContributors);
                return;
            }
            console.log(`üì° Contributors in project ${projectId}:`, projectContributors);
            // üî¥ LOG ISSUE: Is the contributor already in the list?
            console.log(`üîç Checking if Contributor ID ${newContributorId} is already in the project...`);
            // If contributor is NOT in the project, add them first
            if (!projectContributors.some((c)=>c.id === parseInt(newContributorId))) {
                console.log(`‚ûï Contributor ${newContributorId} is NOT in project ${projectId}, adding...`);
                await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}/contributors/manage`, {
                    method: "POST",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        contributor_id: newContributorId
                    })
                });
                // Refetch the updated project contributors after adding
                const updatedContributorsRes = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${projectId}/contributors/manage`);
                const updatedContributors = await updatedContributorsRes.json(); // ‚úÖ Correct variable name
                console.log(`‚úÖ Updated Contributors in project ${projectId}:`, updatedContributors);
                // ‚úÖ Update UI with latest contributors list
                setContributors((prevContributors)=>{
                    const updatedSet = new Set(updatedContributors.map((c)=>c.id));
                    return [
                        ...prevContributors.filter((c)=>!updatedSet.has(c.id)),
                        ...updatedContributors.map((c)=>({
                                ...c,
                                is_in_project: c.is_in_project ?? false
                            }))
                    ];
                });
            }
            // üî¥ LOG ISSUE: Does the contributor exist in the state after update?
            console.log("üîç Updated contributor state: ", contributors);
            // Now assign the contributor to the task
            const response = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks/${taskId}`, {
                method: "PATCH",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    contributor_id: newContributorId
                })
            });
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to assign contributor");
            const updatedTask = await response.json();
            console.log("‚úÖ Contributor assigned successfully:", updatedTask);
            // ‚úÖ Update the local tasks state
            setTasks((prevTasks)=>prevTasks.map((task1)=>task1.id === taskId ? {
                        ...task1,
                        contributor_id: newContributorId,
                        contributor_name: updatedTask.task.contributor_name
                    } : task1));
            // ‚úÖ WebSocket: Notify all clients about the change
            socket.emit("update_task", {
                taskId,
                contributor_id: newContributorId,
                contributor_name: updatedTask.task.contributor_name
            });
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("‚ùå Error assigning contributor:", error);
        }
    };
    // ‚úÖ Debugging log for modal state changes
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        if (isModalOpen) {
            console.log("üîÑ isModalOpen changed:", isModalOpen);
        }
    }, [
        isModalOpen
    ]);
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        console.log("üõ†Ô∏è Step 1: Fetching projects...");
        fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects").then((response)=>response.json()).then((projects)=>{
            console.log("‚úÖ Step 2: Projects loaded:", projects);
            setProjects(projects);
            // Find "Miscellaneous" project and set it as default
            const miscProject = (Array.isArray(projects) ? projects : []).find((p)=>p.name === "Miscellaneous");
            if (miscProject) {
                console.log("‚úÖ Step 3: Defaulting to 'Miscellaneous' project", miscProject.id);
                setSelectedProjectId(miscProject.id);
            } else {
                console.warn("‚ö†Ô∏è 'Miscellaneous' project not found. Creating it...");
                // Create "Miscellaneous" project if it doesn't exist
                fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects", {
                    method: "POST",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        name: "Miscellaneous"
                    })
                }).then((response)=>response.json()).then((newProject)=>{
                    console.log("‚úÖ Step 4: 'Miscellaneous' project created:", newProject);
                    setSelectedProjectId(newProject.id);
                    setProjects((prev)=>[
                            ...prev,
                            newProject
                        ]); // Add to state
                }).catch((error)=>console.error("üö® Step 5: Error creating 'Miscellaneous' project:", error));
            }
        }).catch((error)=>console.error("üö® Step 6: Error fetching projects:", error));
    }, []);
    // ‚úÖ Ensure taskData updates when selectedProjectId changes
    const [taskData, setTaskData] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(selectedTask || {
        name: "",
        description: "",
        task_type: "User Story",
        priority: "Unset",
        status: "Not Started",
        project_id: ""
    });
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        if (selectedProjectId && !taskData.project_id) {
            setTaskData((prev)=>({
                    ...prev,
                    project_id: selectedProjectId
                }));
        }
    }, [
        selectedProjectId
    ]);
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        console.log("Task Data:", taskData);
    }, [
        taskData
    ]);
    // ‚úÖ Updated createNewTask - Immediately saves task before opening modal
    const createNewTask = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useCallback"])(async ()=>{
        console.log("üõ†Ô∏è Step 5: createNewTask triggered - Saving task before opening modal...");
        // ‚úÖ Ensure projects are loaded
        if (projects.length === 0) {
            console.warn("‚ö†Ô∏è Step 6a: No projects available, fetching projects...");
            try {
                const response = await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects");
                const fetchedProjects = await response.json();
                setProjects(fetchedProjects);
            } catch (error) {
                console.error("üö® Step 6b: Error fetching projects:", error);
                return;
            }
        }
        // ‚úÖ Find or create the "Miscellaneous" project
        let miscProject = projects.find((p)=>p.name === "Miscellaneous");
        let defaultProjectId = miscProject ? miscProject.id : null;
        if (!defaultProjectId) {
            console.warn("‚ö†Ô∏è Step 7a: 'Miscellaneous' project not found. Creating it...");
            try {
                const response = await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects", {
                    method: "POST",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        name: "Miscellaneous"
                    })
                });
                const newProject = await response.json();
                console.log("‚úÖ Step 7b: 'Miscellaneous' project created:", newProject);
                defaultProjectId = newProject.id;
                setProjects((prev)=>[
                        ...prev,
                        newProject
                    ]); // Add to state
            } catch (error) {
                console.error("üö® Step 7c: Error creating 'Miscellaneous' project:", error);
                return;
            }
        }
        // ‚úÖ Step 8: Create the new task immediately
        let taskPayload = {
            title: "Untitled Task",
            description: "",
            task_type: "User Story",
            priority: "Unset",
            status: "Not Started",
            project_id: defaultProjectId
        };
        // ‚úÖ Only include `epic_priority` if the task is an Epic
        if (taskPayload.task_type === "Epic") {
            taskPayload.epic_priority = "Unset"; // Default for Epics
        } else {
            delete taskPayload.epic_priority; // ‚úÖ Completely remove epic_priority for non-Epics
        }
        console.log("üì° Task Payload before sending:", JSON.stringify(taskPayload, null, 2));
        try {
            const response = await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks", {
                method: "POST",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                body: JSON.stringify(taskPayload)
            });
            if (!response.ok) {
                const errorText = await response.text();
                console.error("üö® Step 10a: Task creation failed!", errorText);
                return;
            }
            const newTask = await response.json();
            console.log("‚úÖ Step 10b: New Task Created - checking 'newTask':", newTask);
            // ‚úÖ Ensure `project_id` is in state before opening modal
            console.log("üõ†Ô∏è Step 10c: Checking Task Object 'newTask.task':", newTask.task);
            console.log("üîç Step 10d: Checkign project_id presence 'newTask?.task?.project_id':", newTask?.task?.project_id);
            if (!newTask.task) {
                console.error("üö® Step 10c-error: Response does not contain a 'task' object!", newTask);
                return;
            }
            // ‚úÖ Ensure `tasks` is updated so `handleFieldChange` can find task 319
            setTasks((prevTasks)=>[
                    ...prevTasks,
                    newTask.task
                ]);
            // Ensure `project_id` exists before proceeding
            if (!newTask.task.project_id) {
                console.error("üö® Step 10d: New Task missing project_id!", newTask.task);
                return;
            }
            setTaskData((prev)=>({
                    ...newTask.task,
                    project_id: newTask.task.project_id || defaultProjectId
                }));
            setSelectedTask1(newTask.task);
            setTaskData(newTask.task); // ‚úÖ Ensure `taskData` is in sync
            setIsModalOpen1(true);
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("üö® Step 13: Error creating new task:", error);
        }
    }, [
        projects,
        selectedProjectId
    ]);
    const handleFieldChange = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useCallback"])(async (taskId, field, value)=>{
        console.log(`üìå Row 210 - Step 21: handleFieldChange called with taskId: ${taskId}, field: '${field}', value: '${value}'`);
        if (!taskId) {
            console.error("üö® Error: taskId is undefined or null!");
            return;
        }
        const taskToUpdate = tasks1.find((task1)=>task1.id === taskId);
        console.log("üîç row 218-Step 22: Checking if task exists in local state:", taskToUpdate);
        if (!taskToUpdate || taskToUpdate[field] === value) {
            console.warn(`‚ö†Ô∏è row 221-Step 23: No changes detected for ${field}, skipping API call.`);
            return;
        }
        // ‚úÖ Update `taskData` immediately to reflect UI changes before API call
        setTaskData((prevTaskData)=>({
                ...prevTaskData,
                [field]: value
            }));
        try {
            const payload = {
                [field]: value
            };
            console.log("üì° Step 24: Sending update to API for", field);
            const response = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks/${taskId}`, {
                method: "PATCH",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                body: JSON.stringify(payload)
            });
            if (!response.ok) {
                console.error("üö® Step 26: API Error - Response not OK", response.status);
                const errorText = await response.text();
                throw new Error(`Failed to update ${field}: HTTP ${errorText}`);
            }
            const responseData = await response.json();
            console.log("üì© Step 25: API Response Received:", responseData);
            console.log(`‚úÖ Step 27: Successfully updated '${field}' for Task ${taskId} to '${value}'`);
            // ‚úÖ Handle Project Update (Ensure Project Name is Reflected)
            let updatedProjectName = taskToUpdate.project;
            if (field === "project_id") {
                console.log("üìå Step 28: Checking project name for project_id:", value);
                console.log("üìå Current projects state:", projects);
                if (!Array.isArray(projects)) {
                    console.error("üö® projects is not an array!", projects);
                }
                const updatedProject = projects.find((p)=>p.id === parseInt(value, 10));
                updatedProjectName = updatedProject ? updatedProject.name : "Unknown Project";
                console.log(`‚úÖ Step 29: Updated project name: ${updatedProjectName}`);
            }
            // ‚úÖ Handle Contributor Updates - Ensure Contributor Name is Reflected
            let updatedContributorId = taskToUpdate.contributor_id;
            let updatedContributorName = taskToUpdate.contributor_name;
            if (field === "contributor_id") {
                updatedContributorId = responseData?.task?.contributor_id || value;
                updatedContributorName = responseData?.task?.contributor_name || "Unassigned";
            }
            // ‚úÖ Update Local Task State in `tasks` array
            console.log("üîÑ Step 29: Updating local state with new values...");
            setTasks((prevTasks)=>prevTasks.map((task1)=>task1.id === taskId ? {
                        ...task1,
                        [field]: value,
                        ...field === "project_id" && {
                            project: updatedProjectName
                        },
                        ...field === "contributor_id" && {
                            contributor_id: updatedContributorId,
                            contributor_name: updatedContributorName
                        }
                    } : task1));
            // ‚úÖ If the modal is open for this task, update `selectedTask` as well
            if (selectedTask && selectedTask.id === taskId) {
                console.log("üîÑ Step 31: Updating selectedTask state in modal...");
                setSelectedTask1((prev)=>({
                        ...prev,
                        [field]: value,
                        ...field === "project_id" && {
                            project: updatedProjectName
                        },
                        ...field === "contributor_id" && {
                            contributor_id: updatedContributorId,
                            contributor_name: updatedContributorName
                        }
                    }));
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error(`üö® Step 31: Error updating ${field}:`, error);
        }
    }, [
        projects,
        selectedTask,
        tasks1
    ]);
    const handleDeleteTask = async ()=>{
        if (!taskToDelete) return;
        try {
            const response = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks/delete/${taskToDelete}`, {
                method: "DELETE"
            });
            if (!response.ok) throw new Error("Failed to delete task");
            setTasks((prevTasks)=>prevTasks.filter((task1)=>task1.id !== taskToDelete));
            setIsDeleteModalOpen(false);
            console.log(`Deleted Task ID: ${taskToDelete}`);
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error deleting task:", error);
        }
    };
    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2d$jsx$2d$dev$2d$runtime$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["jsxDEV"])(__TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2d$jsx$2d$dev$2d$runtime$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["Fragment"], {
        children: [
            /*#__PURE__*/ (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2d$jsx$2d$dev$2d$runtime$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["jsxDEV"])("button", {
                className: "text-red-400 hover:text-red-600 text-center",
                onClick: ()=>openDeleteModal(task.id),
                children: /*#__PURE__*/ (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2d$jsx$2d$dev$2d$runtime$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["jsxDEV"])("i", {
                    className: "bi bi-trash"
                }, void 0, false, {
                    fileName: "[project]/src/app/alltasks/page.js",
                    lineNumber: 546,
                    columnNumber: 9
                }, this)
            }, void 0, false, {
                fileName: "[project]/src/app/alltasks/page.js",
                lineNumber: 542,
                columnNumber: 7
            }, this),
            /*#__PURE__*/ (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2d$jsx$2d$dev$2d$runtime$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["jsxDEV"])(__TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$src$2f$components$2f$DeleteTaskModal$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["default"], {
                isOpen: isDeleteModalOpen,
                onClose: ()=>setIsDeleteModalOpen(false),
                onConfirm: handleDeleteTask
            }, void 0, false, {
                fileName: "[project]/src/app/alltasks/page.js",
                lineNumber: 550,
                columnNumber: 7
            }, this)
        ]
    }, void 0, true);
    "TURBOPACK unreachable";
    const loadingProjects = undefined, setLoadingProjects = undefined;
    const handlePriorityChange = undefined;
    const openTaskModal = undefined;
    const closeModal = undefined;
    // ‚úÖ Drag & Drop Handler
    const handleDragEnd = undefined;
    // ‚úÖ Expand/Collapse Nested Tasks
    const toggleExpand = undefined;
    // ‚úÖ Render Tasks Recursively (Ensuring Nested Task Visibility)
    const renderTasks = undefined;
}
{}function TaskModal({ isOpen, selectedTask, projects, selectedProjectId, onClose, handleFieldChange }) {
    // ‚úÖ Fetch contributors using React Query
    //const { data: contributors, error, isLoading } = useQuery(
    //    ['contributors', selectedProjectId], 
    //    () => fetchContributors(selectedProjectId)
    //);
    //if (isLoading) {
    //    console.log("üîÑ Loading contributors...");
    //}
    //if (error) {
    //    console.error("‚ùå Error fetching contributors:", error);
    //}
    const defaultTask = {
        name: "",
        description: "",
        priority: "Unset",
        status: "Not Started",
        project_id: selectedProjectId,
        contributor_id: null,
        story_points: 0
    };
    // ‚úÖ Ensure we always have a valid task object
    const [taskData, setTaskData] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(selectedTask || {
        name: "",
        description: "",
        task_type: "User Story",
        priority: "Unset",
        status: "Not Started",
        project_id: selectedProjectId || ""
    });
    const router = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$navigation$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useRouter"])();
    const pathname = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$navigation$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["usePathname"])();
    const [contributors, setContributors] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])([]);
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        if (!selectedTask || !selectedTask.project_id) {
            console.warn("‚ö†Ô∏è TaskModal Warning: No selectedTask or project_id is undefined!", selectedTask);
            return;
        }
        console.log(`üîÑ Fetching contributors for project_id: ${selectedTask.project_id}`);
        fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${selectedTask.project_id}/contributors/manage`).then((res)=>res.json()).then((data)=>{
            if (!Array.isArray(data)) {
                console.error("‚ùå Project Contributors API response is not an array!", data);
                return;
            }
            console.log(`‚úÖ Contributors loaded for project ${selectedTask.project_id}:`, data);
            setContributors(data);
        }).catch((error)=>console.error("‚ùå Error fetching contributors:", error));
    }, [
        selectedTask?.project_id
    ]); // ‚úÖ Runs when `selectedTask.project_id` changes
    const [viewMode, setViewMode] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])("modal");
    // ‚úÖ Define scrollRef here
    const scrollRef = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useRef"])(null);
    // ‚úÖ Ensure taskData syncs properly when selectedTask changes
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        setTaskData(selectedTask || {});
    }, [
        selectedTask
    ]);
    // ‚úÖ Track if project_id is set
    const [readyToFetchContributors, setReadyToFetchContributors] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(false);
    const effectRun = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useRef"])(false); // ‚úÖ Prevents double execution in strict mode
    // ‚úÖ NEW: Set "Miscellaneous" as default if no project is selected
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        console.log("üìå Checking available projects before assigning default:", projects);
        if (!selectedTask) {
            const miscProject = projects.find((p)=>p.name === "Miscellaneous");
            if (miscProject) {
                console.log("‚úÖ 'Miscellaneous' project found, using ID:", miscProject.id);
                setTaskData((prev)=>({
                        ...prev,
                        name: "",
                        description: "",
                        task_type: "User Story",
                        priority: "Unset",
                        status: "Not Started",
                        project_id: miscProject.id
                    }));
                setReadyToFetchContributors(true); // ‚úÖ Now project_id is available
            } else {
                console.warn("‚ö†Ô∏è 'Miscellaneous' project is missing!");
                setReadyToFetchContributors(false);
            }
        }
    }, [
        selectedTask,
        projects
    ]);
    // ‚úÖ Define debouncedSave inside TaskModal with correct reference
    const debouncedSaveRef = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useRef"])((0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$lodash$2f$debounce$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["default"])((taskId, field, value, handleFieldChange)=>{
        console.log(`üî• Debounced Save Triggered at ${new Date().toISOString()} for ${field}:`, value);
        if (typeof handleFieldChange === "function") {
            handleFieldChange(taskId, field, value);
        } else {
            console.error("üö® handleFieldChange is not defined inside debounce!");
        }
    }, 1000));
    const handleMouseDown = (event)=>{
        if (scrollRef.current) {
            onMouseDown(event); // ‚úÖ This now works correctly
        }
    };
    const handleCreateNewTask = ()=>{
        setSelectedTask({
            name: "",
            description: "",
            priority: "Medium",
            status: "Not Started",
            project_id: selectedProject?.id || null,
            contributor_id: null,
            story_points: 0
        });
        setIsModalOpen(true);
    };
    const [taskNameWarning, setTaskNameWarning] = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useState"])(""); // ‚úÖ Store warning message
    const validateTaskName = (taskName)=>{
        console.log("üîç Validating Task Name:", taskName);
        // Check for existing tasks with the same name
        if (tasks.some((task1)=>task1.name === taskName)) {
            setTaskNameWarning("‚ö†Ô∏è A task with this name already exists.");
        } else {
            setTaskNameWarning(""); // Clear warning when name is unique
        }
    };
    const debouncedHandleChange = (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$lodash$2f$debounce$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["default"])((event)=>{
        const { name, value } = event.currentTarget;
        console.log(`üõ†Ô∏è Debounced handleChange triggered for '${name}' ‚Üí '${value}'`);
        setTaskData((prev)=>({
                ...prev,
                [name]: value
            }));
        // ‚úÖ Only validate the name field for new tasks
        if (!selectedTask?.id && name === "name") {
            validateTaskName(value);
        }
    }, 500);
    // ‚úÖ Modified handleChange to create the task on first input
    const handleChange = async (event)=>{
        event.persist(); // ‚úÖ Ensure the event is available inside debounce
        const { name, value } = event.target; // ‚úÖ Extract name and value from event
        console.log(`üõ†Ô∏è Step 11: handleChange triggered for '${event.target.name}' ‚Üí '${event.target.value}'`);
        // ‚úÖ Update state immediately for instant UI feedback
        setTaskData((prev)=>({
                ...prev,
                [name]: value
            }));
        console.log("üîÑ Step 11a: Updated taskData:", taskData);
        // ‚úÖ If editing an existing task, update it using `handleFieldChange`
        if (taskData.id || selectedTask?.id) {
            console.log(`üìå Step 12: Updating existing task ${taskData.id || selectedTask?.id}`);
            debouncedSaveRef.current(taskData.id || selectedTask?.id, name, value, handleFieldChange); // ‚úÖ Use `handleFieldChange`
            return;
        }
        // ‚úÖ If creating a new task (no ID yet), create it on first input
        try {
            console.log("üõ†Ô∏è Step 14: Creating new task...");
            console.log("üì° Sending payload to API:");
            const response = await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/tasks", {
                method: "POST",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    title: taskData.name || "Untitled Task",
                    description: taskData.description || "",
                    task_type: taskData.task_type || "User Story",
                    priority: taskData.priority || "Unset",
                    status: taskData.status || "Not Started",
                    project_id: taskData.project_id || selectedProjectId
                })
            });
            const responseData = await response.json();
            console.log("üì© Step 15: API Response Received:", responseData);
            // ‚úÖ Handle warnings (like duplicate task name)
            if (responseData.warning) {
                console.warn(`‚ö†Ô∏è Step 16: Task name warning: ${responseData.warning}`);
                setTaskNameWarning(responseData.warning); // ‚úÖ Display warning message
            } else {
                setTaskNameWarning(""); // ‚úÖ Remove warning when name becomes unique
            }
            console.log(`‚úÖ Step 17: New Task Created Successfully - Task ID: ${responseData.task.id}, Name: "${responseData.task.name}"`);
            // ‚úÖ Update state with new task ID (so future updates use `handleFieldChange`)
            setTaskData((prev)=>({
                    ...prev,
                    id: responseData.task.id
                }));
            console.log("üîÑ Step 18: Updated taskData with new ID:", taskData);
            if (typeof setSelectedTask === "function") {
                setSelectedTask(responseData.task); // ‚úÖ Ensure setSelectedTask is defined
            } else {
                console.error("üö® Step 19b: setSelectedTask is not available.");
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("üö® Step 20: Error creating new task:", error);
        }
    };
    // ‚úÖ Cleanup Effect to prevent debounce issues
    (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        return ()=>{
            console.log("üõë Cancelling debouncedSave, but NOT closing modal.");
            debouncedSaveRef.current.cancel();
        };
    }, []);
    /*
  // ‚úÖ Fetch Contributors AFTER taskData.project_id is updated (Prevents double execution)
  // useEffect(() => {
  //  if (!readyToFetchContributors || !taskData.project_id) {
  //      console.warn(`‚ö†Ô∏è project_id is still undefined. Skipping contributor fetch.`);
  //      return;
  //  }

    if (effectRun.current) {
        console.log("üõë Skipping duplicate contributor fetch due to React Strict Mode.");
        return;
    }

    console.log(`üîÑ Fetching contributors for project_id: ${taskData.project_id}`);
    
    let isCancelled = false; // ‚úÖ Prevents duplicate API calls if effect runs twice

    const fetchContributors = async () => {
        try {
            console.log(`üîÑ Fetching contributors for project_id: ${taskData.project_id}`);
            const res = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${taskData.project_id}/contributors/manage`);
            if (!res.ok) throw new Error(`HTTP error! Status: ${res.status}`);
            const contributorsData = await res.json();
            if (!isCancelled) { // ‚úÖ Ensures state updates only if effect is still valid
                console.log("‚úÖ Contributors loaded:", contributorsData);
                setContributors(contributorsData);
            }
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("‚ùå Error fetching contributors:", error);
        }
    };

    fetchContributors();
    effectRun.current = true; // ‚úÖ Ensures this effect only runs once

    return () => {
        console.log("üõë Cleaning up contributor fetch effect.");
        isCancelled = true; // ‚úÖ Prevents duplicate API calls
    };
  }, [readyToFetchContributors, taskData.project_id]); // ‚úÖ Waits for `readyToFetchContributors` to be true
*/ (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["useEffect"])(()=>{
        if (!selectedTask || !selectedTask.project_id) {
            console.warn("‚ö†Ô∏è TaskModal Warning: selectedTask or project_id is undefined!");
            return;
        }
    }, [
        selectedTask
    ]);
    const handleContributorChange = async (e)=>{
        const newContributorId = e.target.value;
        setTaskData((prevTaskData)=>({
                ...prevTaskData,
                assigned_to: newContributorId
            }));
        try {
            const checkRes = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${taskData.project_id}/contributors/manage`);
            const projectContributors = await checkRes.json();
            if (!projectContributors.some((c)=>c.id === parseInt(newContributorId))) {
                await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${taskData.project_id}/contributors/manage`, {
                    method: "POST",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        contributor_id: newContributorId
                    })
                });
            }
            const updatedContributorsRes = await fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/projects/${taskData.project_id}/contributors/manage`);
            setContributors(await updatedContributorsRes.json());
        } catch (error) {
            console.error("Error adding contributor to project:", error);
        }
    };
    const closeModal = ()=>{
        setSelectedTask(null); // ‚úÖ Clears modal when closed
    };
    if (!selectedTask && !isOpen) return null;
    return /*#__PURE__*/ (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2d$jsx$2d$dev$2d$runtime$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["jsxDEV"])("div", {

                    /*#__PURE__*/ (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2d$jsx$2d$dev$2d$runtime$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["jsxDEV"])("div", {
                        className: "absolute top-4 right-6 flex space-x-3",
                        children: /*#__PURE__*/ (0, __TURBOPACK__imported__module__$5b$project$5d2f$node_modules$2f$next$2f$dist$2f$server$2f$route$2d$modules$2f$app$2d$page$2f$vendored$2f$ssr$2f$react$2d$jsx$2d$dev$2d$runtime$2e$js__$5b$app$2d$ssr$5d$__$28$ecmascript$29$__["jsxDEV"])("button", {

                                                onChange: (e)=>{
                                                    const selectedProjectId = e.target.value;
                                                    console.log(`üéØ Row 1125-Project change: Step 1: Project selected: ${selectedProjectId} for task ${taskData.id}`); // <-- ADD THIS LINE
                                                    // ‚úÖ Ensure taskData has a valid task ID before updating
                                                    if (!taskData.id) {
                                                        console.error("üö® Cannot update project, task ID is missing!", taskData);
                                                        return;
                                                    }
                                                    // ‚úÖ Update the backend
                                                    handleFieldChange(taskData.id, "project_id", selectedProjectId);
                                                    // ‚úÖ Log when "Miscellaneous" is selected
                                                    const selectedProject1 = projects.find((p)=>p.id === parseInt(selectedProjectId, 10));
                                                    if (selectedProject1?.name === "Miscellaneous") {
                                                        console.log("‚ö†Ô∏è Task is assigned to 'Miscellaneous'. Consider selecting a project.");
                                                    }
